doc.after: ASEAN has formulated a planned integration among its ten member nations and has challenged its citizens to embrace a regional identity The call for ASEAN identity delivers a challenge to construct dynamic institutions and foster sufficient amounts of social capital The underlying assumption is that the creation of a regional identity is of special interest to ASEAN and the intent of the 2020 Vision policy document was to reassert the belief in a regional framework designed as an action plan related to human development and civic empowerment Accordingly these assumptions will be the basis for recommendations and strategies in developing a participatory regional identity 90
